data:
<educational_content>
# Getting Started Checklist

Welcome to Excel High School! This checklist will help you complete all necessary onboarding tasks to begin your educational journey with us. We've included estimated completion times for each task to help you plan accordingly.

> **IMPORTANT: Save this checklist—refer back any time you need guidance on your initial setup process.**

## First Day Tasks

* [ ] **Log in to your Student Portal** (5 minutes)
  * Visit the Excel High School website and click "Student Login"
  * Use the username and password emailed to you
  * Bookmark this page for easy access

* [ ] **Complete your Student Profile** (10 minutes)
  * Upload a profile photo (optional)
  * Verify your contact information
  * Set your notification preferences

* [ ] **Technology Check** (10 minutes)
  * Test your internet connection
  * Ensure your device meets minimum requirements
  * Download any required browsers or software

* [ ] **Review the Student Handbook** (30 minutes)
  * Download and save the handbook for future reference
  * Pay special attention to academic policies and procedures
  * Note important contact information

## First Week Tasks

* [ ] **Explore the Learning Management System** (15 minutes)
  * Navigate through each section of your dashboard
  * Locate where assignments are submitted
  * Find the gradebook and progress tracking tools

* [ ] **Add important dates to your calendar** (10 minutes)
  * Note course start and end dates
  * Schedule regular study times
  * Mark assignment due dates

* [ ] **Set up your study space** (30 minutes)
  * Create a dedicated, distraction-free area
  * Gather necessary supplies
  * Ensure proper lighting and ergonomics

* [ ] **Complete the Excel Student Orientation course** (45 minutes)
  * Learn about Excel High School's learning approach
  * Understand how to access support resources
  * Practice using the online learning tools

* [ ] **Introduce yourself in the student forum** (10 minutes)
  * Post a brief introduction about yourself
  * Connect with fellow students
  * Practice using the communication tools

## Course Preparation Tasks

* [ ] **Review your course syllabus/syllabi** (15 minutes per course)
  * Note required textbooks or materials
  * Understand grading policies
  * Preview upcoming assignments and projects

* [ ] **Access your digital textbooks or resources** (10 minutes per course)
  * Download any offline materials
  * Bookmark online resources
  * Test any access codes

* [ ] **Create a study schedule** (20 minutes)
  * Plan specific times for each course
  * Include breaks and review sessions
  * Set realistic daily and weekly goals

* [ ] **Contact your academic advisor** (15 minutes)
  * Schedule an initial check-in meeting
  * Prepare any questions you have
  * Discuss your academic goals

* [ ] **Join the technical support orientation** (20 minutes)
  * Learn how to access help when needed
  * Understand troubleshooting procedures
  * Save contact information for IT support

## Final Setup Tasks

* [ ] **Download recommended apps** (15 minutes)
  * Install any mobile apps for on-the-go learning
  * Set up notification settings
  * Test functionality across devices

* [ ] **Establish your academic goals** (15 minutes)
  * Write down your short and long-term goals
  * Create a tracking system for your progress
  * Share goals with your academic advisor if desired

* [ ] **Familiarize yourself with academic integrity policies** (10 minutes)
  * Review plagiarism guidelines
  * Understand citation requirements
  * Know the consequences of academic dishonesty

* [ ] **Test the video conferencing tools** (10 minutes)
  * Check your camera and microphone
  * Practice joining a test meeting
  * Understand how to participate in virtual sessions

* [ ] **Bookmark important resources** (5 minutes)
  * Technical support page
  * Student services contact information
  * Academic calendar
  * Online library and research tools

Remember, your success at Excel High School starts with proper preparation. Complete these tasks within your first week to ensure a smooth transition to online learning. If you need assistance with any item on this checklist, don't hesitate to contact Student Support at support@excelhighschool.com.

> **PRO TIP: Save this checklist—refer back any time you need a refresher on important student resources or setup procedures.**
</educational_content>
